Cloud

Easily create beautiful dashboards with no software to install and no IT requires. All you need is a computer with a modern browser and an internet connection.

On-Premise

You have complete control over your company's experience. Keep your data on your servers and manage private cloud deployment with your Azure, AWS, or GCE account.

Embedded

Integrate dashboard into your business applications in any form you need. Host them on your data center, host them on the cloud, or allow customers to host their own instances.
